page.title: 15ASHILL CLUBS (3)
page.content: The school has a{Parent Teachers {Association}whose main activity is raising funds for school equipment, just recently a second ZX Spectrum computer has been purchased. The{Woman's Institute}meets once a month at the community centre and has a guest speaker followed by a small competition. They also organise the well supported annual Produce Show. The{St. JOHNS AMBULANCE BRIGADE}meets two nights a week at the St. JOHNS Hall (a small building near the western end of church street). There are Junior, Cadet and Adult members (Fee 20p weekly,Cadets). They also arrange first aid lectures for non-members and have a comprehensive store of medical equipment available for the use of the parishioners.
